option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd" version="4.0">
<display-name>Pahana Edu Web Application</display-name>
<!-- Default page --> <welcome-file-list> <welcome-file>login.jsp</welcome-file> </welcome-file-list>
<!-- Login servlet --> <servlet> <servlet-name>LoginServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>control.LoginServlet</servlet-class> </servlet>
<servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>LoginServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/login</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>
<!-- Optional: Logout servlet --> <servlet> <servlet-name>LogoutServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>control.LogoutServlet</servlet-class> </servlet>
<servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>LogoutServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/logout</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>
</web-app>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <web-app xmlns="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_4_0.xsd" version="4.0">
<display-name>Pahana Edu Web Application</display-name>
<!-- Default page --> <welcome-file-list> <welcome-file>login.jsp</welcome-file> </welcome-file-list>
<!-- Login servlet --> <servlet> <servlet-name>LoginServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>control.LoginServlet</servlet-class> </servlet>
<servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>LoginServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/login</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>
<!-- Optional: Logout servlet --> <servlet> <servlet-name>LogoutServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>control.LogoutServlet</servlet-class> </servlet>
<servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>LogoutServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/logout</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>
<!-- AddItemServlet mapping for /items/add --> <servlet> <servlet-name>AddItemServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>control.AddItemServlet</servlet-class> </servlet>
<servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>AddItemServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/items/add</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>
<!-- ManageItemServlet mapping for /items (to be implemented) --> <servlet> <servlet-name>ManageItemServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>control.ManageItemServlet</servlet-class> </servlet>
<servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>ManageItemServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/items</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>
</web-app>
